unpublishedAction.name: container2_select_record

actionConfiguration.body: SELECT * FROM {{appsmith.store.table === 'jobs' || appsmith.store.table === 'appliances' ? "properties" : appsmith.store.table === 'emails' ? 'jobs' : 'customers'}} WHERE {{appsmith.store.table === 'jobs' || appsmith.store.table === 'appliances' ? 'property_id' : appsmith.store.table === 'emails' ? 'job_id' : 'customer_id'}} = {{appsmith.store.table === 'jobs' || appsmith.store.table === 'appliances' ? select_record.data[0].property_id : appsmith.store.table === 'emails' ?  select_record.data[0].job_id : select_record.data[0].customer_id}}

jsonPathKeys: appsmith.store.table === 'jobs' || appsmith.store.table === 'appliances' ? select_record.data[0].property_id : appsmith.store.table === 'emails' ?  select_record.data[0].job_id : select_record.data[0].customer_id
